repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: Tamil version of the Vikramacarita, that is, 32 stories (Tamil katai) about the king Vikrama (Vikkiramātittaṉ) told to king Bhoja by the figurines (Tamil patumai) of his throne.

filiation.p: GOML R. 1972, R. 2244. UVSL, vol. 4, pp. 246-7, No. 2040. TMSSML, vol. 1 , 1925, Nos. 579 and 589.

extent.measure: I.e. extent of main textual unit (U1). Tamil foliation.

collation.desc: the front cover. Element of library binding.
1 folio = front guard folio. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Marbled paper on recto. Element of library binding.
1 folio = front guard folio. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
1 folio = front guard folio. Arabic black ink library foliation 1 on bottom right edge & Arabic pencil foliation 1 on bottom right edge. Shelfmark, title and stamp on the recto.
1 folio = front guard folio. Arabic pencil foliation 2 on bottom right edge. Catalogue reference on the recto. Old paper (original book).

44 folios = text. Tamil black ink pagination [1], 2-89 (first page not explicitly paginated) on top right edge; Arabic black ink library foliation 1-46 on upper top right edge; Arabic pencil foliation 3-47 on bottom right edge.
1 folio = back guard folio. Arabic black ink library foliation 47 on upper top right edge. Title and stamp on the recto. Watermark.
1 folio = back guard folio. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
1 folio = back guard folio. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Marbled paper on verso. Element of library binding.

additions.desc: Shelfmark N°14 and title Vicra marken kadey in black ink, on the recto.
Catalogue reference Catal. Imper. N° XIV in black pencil, on the recto.
Small paper, inserted in the binding between u5 and U1, bearing in black ink the title Vikramarken Kadai Tamoul. Note for the binder indicating the title to be displayed on the spine.
Title Vicramarcoum catta in black ink on the recto.
Stamp BIBLIOTHEQUE ROYALE on the verso.

binding.p: Leather cover, with title and heraldic lilies on the spine.

origin.origDate: 1729 at the latest. Dated to 1750 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments).

acquisition.p: It appears to be the paper Vicramarquen Cadey and Vicramarken Kadey sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in 1729 for the library of the king of France and mentioned in ancien lists (BnF NAF 5442, f5r and f9r).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 49.
S.n. (1739). Catalogus codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae regiae. Tomus primus. Pars prima, complectens codices manuscriptos orientales. Paris: Typographia Regia. — See p. 434.
Zvelebil, Kamil Veith (1997a). The Tamil Vikramaditya. JAOS 117.2, pp. 294-305.

revisionDesc.change: This catalogue entry has been redacted by Emmanuel FRANCIS (CNRS, CEIAS UMR 8564, EHESS/CNRS) for the research program Texts Surrounding Texts (TST, FRAL 2018, ANR/DFG). Version 1, December 2020.
Updated to TST encoding conventions by Emmanuel FRANCIS.

text.body:
vikkiṟamātittaṉ patumaikkatai
vētamutalē viṉāyaka
ṉentaṉiṭa kātaluk
ku muṉ tōṉṟuṅ kaṇa
tiyē nītipuṉai vikki
ṟamāṟkaṉ pēril vē
ṇṭuṅ kataiy uraikka
yikkataikku nīyē tu
ṇai – viṉāyakaṉ tō
ttiramuṟṟum + – –
vikkiṟāmāṟkaṉ ka –
taiyāka pōcarāca
ṉ ciṅkātāṉatti –
le Eṟa vanta pōtu
patumaikaḷ coṉṉa katai –
mutal-k katai
y-iraṇṭāṅ katai
– pirā
maṇatti piḷḷai vārucikṣa
ttiriyap peṇṇiṉ piḷḷai
vikkiṟamāṟkaṉ vayici
yap peṇṇiṉ piḷḷai
paṭṭi cūttirap peṇ
niṉ piḷḷai pattira
karipiḷḷaikaḷukk’ e
llāmūttavaṉ patti
rakiri + muṟṟum ++
